title: Loop to processes digits of num- describe behavior

content.question: Which of the following best describes the value printed by this code segment?

choices.label: A count of the number of digits in  num
The average of the digits in  num
The sum of the digits in  num
Whether  num  is evenly divisible by 10

content.answer: The sum of the digits in  num

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
